name: Horse-Trader
description: A place connected to food production or animal husbandry; adventurers could hire mounts, resupply, or quell beasts.
atmosphere: The trading area is filled with the earthy scent of horses and the sound of hooves on packed earth. The air carries the promise of travel and the essential bond between rider and mount, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of commerce and the importance of quality livestock.
